content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->3->4->7->3

This is the shortest path from node 1 to node 3 in the given graph. The path involves going from node 1 to node 2, then to node 3, then to node 4, and finally to node 7. Then, from node 7, you go directly to node 3. Therefore, the total length of the path is 4 edges.

1->2->3

This is the shortest path from node 1 to node 3 in the graph given above. The path involves going from node 1 to node 2, then directly to node 3. Therefore, the total length of the path is 2 edges.
